posts.message:
I have a big problem in anew project that is about to be launched in a few days

Data is concatenated and i find no better way to clone it 

================
DB Structure : 
One Course has many chapters ,
Every Chapter has many Subjects ,
Every Subject has many Questions ,
Every Question has many Answers .
================================
Required cloning a course from user to another ,
================================
I did it like that :
================
1- select query = course
insert query  = new course -> new course  ID

2- select query = chapters of course
loop start on chapters
     using new course  ID :  
     insert query  = new chapter -> new chapter  ID

          3- select query = subjects of chapter 
          loop start on subjects
               using new chapter ID :
               insert query  = new subject -> new subject ID

                   4- select query = questions of subject 
                   loop start on Questions
                        using new subject ID :    
                        insert query  = new question -> new question ID

                              5- and so on for answers 

                   loop end on Questions 

          loop end on  subjects 

loop end on  Chapters

================================

The problem is that a single course could have a 400 questions

and this is a massive no of queries to be done specially when this process is done repeatedly 

================================

waiting for your generous help :)
A tool for automatically solving problems of the form "I need a python function that does X" :)
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: funcfinder - A tool for automatically solving problems of the form "I need a python function that does X."

posts.message:
If there is a front end developer and there is a back end developer.
So what is a full stack developer? is he a superhero? :D

السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته 
انا معايا برنامج مخازن وادراة محلات 
البرانامج انا عامله بال asp.net وشغال عند اكتر من 10 عملاء 
كنت بفكر ابيع السورس كود بتاعه فكنت عايز اعرف ابيعه فين وازاي اتمنه 
انا فتحت شركة برمجيات متخصصة في برامج ادارة عيادات ومستشفيات ومراكز طبيه 
ومش هبيع البرنامج تاني لعملاء جدد فعايز ابيع السورس كود

#جوجل بتقدم 2GB مساحة تتضاف لحسابك في#Google #Drive لما تعمل Google's account security checkup صغير جدًا :D

هتقعد بس تأكد على معلوماتك هتدوس 3 زراير بالعدد وهتكسب 2GB ببلاش :D المساحة دي بتفرق والله ما تستهونش والcheckup مش هياخد منك ثواني :D

لينك الcheckup أهو:
https://security.google.com/settings/security/secureaccount

ودي صورة التأكيد تحت :D

#شير يمكن حد غيرك محتاج ال2GB دول :D

Always :D 
By the way people think this is wrong and you need to at least know why it is not working that way but works other way !
I am sure that your professor never explained it as clear as that
